'''Task name:''' Nautilus

'''Description:''' Use ''Nautilus'' to browse the file system.

'''Procedure:'''
* Open ''nautilus'' and browse your file structure
* Open a second window and try to copy or move files between them
* Open <code>Edit > Preferences</code> and change some settings
* Optionally: try burning a CD

'''Comments:'''
* Please include the release you are testing with in your comment. Include your launchpad ID at the end of your comments:
** Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
** Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID.
